General.Name: Almendral
General.Description: Almendral S.A., through its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication services in Chile. The company provides mobile telecommunications services comprising voice, value added, data, broadband, and mobile Internet and fixed network services, as well as call center services for the corporate market. It also offers mobile telephony, fixed telephony, data communication, information technology, data center, and internet integrated solutions. The company was formerly known as Chilquinta, S.A. and changed its name to Almendral S.A. in 2001. Almendral S.A. was founded in 1921 and is based in Vitacura, Chile.
